sim_pattern_non_uni = ci_pattern.CIPatternNonUniform(normalization=100.0,
    regions=[(1, 5, 1, 4), (0, 5, 4, 5)], row_slope=-0.01)
image = sim_pattern_non_uni.simulate_ci_pre_cti(shape=(5, 5), ci_seed=1,
    column_deviation=1.0)
image = np.round(image, 1)
assert (image == np.array([[0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 101.6], [0.0, 101.6, 99.4, 
    99.5, 100.9], [0.0, 100.9, 98.7, 98.8, 100.5], [0.0, 100.5, 98.3, 98.4,
    100.2], [0.0, 100.2, 98.0, 98.1, 100.0]])).all()
